scripts.migrate: docker compose exec api node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-json-modules ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate --config /app/src/config/config.json --migrations-path /app/src/migrations
scripts.migrate:undo: docker compose exec api node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-json-modules ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate:undo --config /app/src/config/config.json --migrations-path /app/src/migrations
scripts.migrate:undo:all: docker compose exec api node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-json-modules ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --config /app/src/config/config.json --migrations-path /app/src/migrations --to
scripts.migrate:generate: docker compose exec api node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-json-modules ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize migration:generate --config /app/src/config/config.json --migrations-path /app/src/migrations --name
scripts.seed:generate: docker compose exec api node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-json-modules ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize seed:generate --config /app/src/config/config.json --seeders-path /app/src/seeders --name
scripts.seed:all: docker compose exec api node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-json-modules ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:all --config /app/src/config/config.json --seeders-path /app/src/seeders
scripts.seed:undo:last: docker compose exec api node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-json-modules ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:undo --config /app/src/config/config.json --seeders-path /app/src/seeders
scripts.seed:undo:all: docker compose exec api node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-json-modules ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:undo:all --config /app/src/config/config.json --seeders-path /app/src/seeders
scripts.seed:undo: docker compose exec api node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-json-modules ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:undo --config /app/src/config/config.json --seeders-path /app/src/seeders --seed
